body_html:
Hi, friend.

Are you looking for output projection?
In the follwowing paper, output projection is proposed, which allows c and h to have different sizes.

Hasim Sak, Andrew Senior, and Francoise Beaufays.
"Long short-term memory recurrent neural network architectures for
large scale acoustic modeling." INTERSPEECH, 2014.

It has already been implemented in tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMCell.

If one needs a more complicated tranformation from h to match the size of c, I would suggest him to write his own RNNCell instead of including it into the standard library.

body:
Hi, friend. 

Are you looking for output projection?
In the follwowing paper, output projection is proposed, which allows `c` and `h` to have different sizes.

>  Hasim Sak, Andrew Senior, and Francoise Beaufays.
>   "Long short-term memory recurrent neural network architectures for
>    large scale acoustic modeling." INTERSPEECH, 2014.

It has already been implemented in `tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMCell`.

If one needs a more complicated tranformation from `h` to match the size of `c`, I would suggest him to write his own RNNCell instead of including it into the standard library.
